  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      At each turn, if there's an actor at the surroundings, loop through the sellable and exchangeable list and check if the actor has the item and weapon item. If the sellable and exchangeable item is available, add a status for them to get ready with Sell Action and Exchangeable Action in actor's playTurn()
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      an action that does nothing
      See Also:
      • Status.READY_TO_BE_SOLD
      • Status.READY_TO_BE_EXCHANGED
      • DoNothingAction

    • provideActorPurchaseService
